description: This module focuses on the conditions of traditional Malay society and covers the following topics: The nature and function of the Malay ruling class, the social and political position of the subject class, the position and function of Islam, the structure and nature of traditional administration, impact of the introduction of Western rule on Malay administration, the nature of traditional economy, aspects of Malay education, traditional Malay recreations. This module is meant for students interested in Malay cultural history in particular and Southeast Asian history in general.
title: Malay Society in 19th Century
